means: 充内行( smatter的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He only has a smattering of French.
On his wanderings he's picked up Spanish, Italian, French and a smattering of Russian.
sentence.Network_cn: 在流浪途中，他学会了西班牙语、意大利语、法语和一丁点儿俄语。

sentence.Network_en: I had acquired a smattering of Greek.
sentence.Network_cn: 我学会了一丁点希腊语。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... smart vi. 刺痛,快速反应 smattering n. 一知半解,浅薄的知识 smother vt. 窒息，压抑.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... sweltering 酷热的 smattering 略知，浅薄的知识 persevering 坚忍不拔的.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... smart 痛苦；a.时髦的；聪明的 smattering 略知；少数 smear 油渍，污点；v.弄脏，玷污.
高级英语第一册 14.Argentia Bay_在线英语听力室 ... ensign (美国)海军少尉 smattering 肤浅的知识 anthem 赞歌，颂歌；国歌；校歌.

list.abs: People with a smattering of physics may bring up " quantum mechanical vacuum fluctuations ", 对物理学一知半解的人们可能会提出 " 量子力学真空涨落 "
Character  -... ... 略知一二[ have a smattering of;know only a little about;know sth.about] 懂得,了解,理会[ understand].
David has only a smattering of astronomy ., 大卫对天文学只是一知半解.
he only knows a smattering of english words ., 他仅会一点英语单词.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from smatter 'talk ignorantly, prate' (surviving in Scots), of unknown origin

entry.def: A smattering of something is a very small amount of it.

example.ex: I had acquired a smattering of Greek.
example.tran: 我学会了一丁点希腊语。

sentences.sentence: "only a handful of responses were received"

means.word_mean: 2. a slight or superficial understanding of a subject

auth_sentence.content: First, there's the smattering of Olympic gold.
auth_sentence.res_content: First, there's the smattering of Olympic gold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First, there's the smattering of Olympic gold.

auth_sentence.content: Surprisingly, there's only a mere smattering of covers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surprisingly, there's only a mere smattering of covers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surprisingly, there's only a mere smattering of covers.

auth_sentence.content: Those that did come on, got a smattering of applause.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those that did come on, got a smattering of applause.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those that did come on, got a smattering of applause.
